The following DITAVAL files are used for testing:
Flagging on @audience value "expert" (audience-expert-flag.ditaval)
Flagging on @rev values (rev01-flag.ditaval)
Flagging on @status values Flagging on @status values is controlled by a single runtime parameter, args.flag-on-status=(true|false), with the default being "false" (no flagging).
